title: Letterhead, Matrix 'Contrast' Corporation, Mineola, Long Island, late 20th century
medium: Letterpress: black, red and gold ink on white wove paper
markings: Watermark: Strathmore Bay Path Bond 50% Cotton Fiber
inscribed: Imprinted below Company name: "Black and white and other contrasts for line casting metal matrices".  Imprinted at left, below text: Branch Offices / 326 West Madison St. Chicago 6, Ill. / 1105 Trenton St., Los Angeles 15, Calif. / 154 West 14th St., New York 11, N.Y.; at right below text: Main Office / 190 Herricks Road, Mineola, L.I., N.Y. / Telephone CH8-9885 (Area Code 516)
description: Across top of sheet, Company name with "Contrast" in red script with rendering of forefingers and thumb holding a black and gold matrix inscribed "See hte [sic] error"

tombstone.epitaph:
Letterhead, Matrix 'Contrast' Corporation, Mineola, Long Island, late 20th century. Letterpress: black, red and gold ink on white wove paper. 
Gift of Thomas F. O'Malley. 1999-59-19.
